people.name: Lasse Schöne
people.aboutText: Conor Cummins (born 27 May 1986, Douglas, Isle of Man) is a Manx motorcycle road racer.

people.name: Gervinho
people.aboutText:
Benjamin Philip "Ben" Pringle (born 27 May 1989) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Fulham. He can play as a Central Midfielder or as a Left Midfielder.
^ a b Hugman, Barry J., ed.

people.name: Eric Kolelas
people.aboutText: Tyler Sash (May 27, 1988 – September 8, 2015) was an American football safety for the University of Iowa Hawkeyes and the New York Giants of the National Football League (NFL).

people.name: Bora Paçun
people.aboutText: Rodrigo de Triano (foaled 27 May 1989 – 5 August 2014) was an English Thoroughbred Champion racehorse.

people.name: Irina Davydova
people.aboutText: Timo Descamps (born 27 May 1986) is a Belgian actor, voice actor and singer. He is best known for his former roles on the Flemish soap operas Spring and Familie. In 2007, Descamps released his first music single, "Phonecall," which rose to 36 on the Ultratop 50.

people.name: Mari Pokinen
people.aboutText: Eric Kolelas (born 27 May 1987) is an Anglo-French actor and film director.

people.name: Allyn Rose
people.aboutText:
Allyn Rose (born May 27, 1988) is an American beauty pageant titleholder, model and breast cancer advocate from Newburg, Maryland.
Rose won the title of Miss District of Columbia 2012 in a state pageant held in Washington, D.C., on June 17, 2012, and competed in the Miss America 2013 pageant. Rose's previous pageant experience includes winning the 1st Miss Sinergy breast cancer philanthropy pageant held at the House of Sweden Embassy in Washington, D.C. She then went on to win the Miss Maryland USA 2011 title.

people.name: Tyler Sash
people.aboutText: Irina Davydova (born 27 May 1988) is a Russian athlete who competes in the 400 metres hurdles with a personal best time of 53.77 seconds.

people.name: Rodrigo de Triano
people.aboutText:
Mari Jürjens, née Mari Pokinen (born May 27, 1988), is an Estonian actress and singer.
She graduated from the University of Tartu Viljandi Culture Academy in 2011 as a professional actress, currently working in Von Krahl Theatre.
In 2010, Jürjens debuted with the 11-track album 22 and released a second album, "Maa saab taevani", in 2013.

people.name: Igor Morozov
people.aboutText: Bora Hun Paçun (born May 27, 1987) is a Turkish professional basketball player.

people.name: Ben Pringle
people.aboutText:
Meelis Kanep (born 27 May 1983) is an Estonian chess grandmaster.
Born in Võru, Võru County, Kanep was the Estonian champion in 2004, 2005 and 2007 and winner of the Paul Keres Memorial Tournament in Tallinn, Estonia in 2005.

people.name: Yenew Alamirew
people.aboutText: Nadine Beiler (born 27 May 1990) is an Austrian R&B and Pop singer, who won the 3rd season of the Austrian casting show Starmania in 2007. On February 16, 2007, she released her first single Alles was du willst. Currently, Beiler is a professional singer and songwriter based in both Vienna and Tyrol, where she lives in Innsbruck.

people.name: Nadine Beiler
people.aboutText:
Ksenia Yuryevna Pervak (Russian: Ксения Юрьевна Первак; born 27 May 1991 in Chelyabinsk, Soviet Union) is a former Russian professional tennis player.
Pervak won one singles title on the WTA tour, as well as nine singles and three doubles titles on the ITF circuit in her career. On 19 September 2011, she reached her best singles ranking of world number 37.

people.name: Chris Colfer
people.aboutText: Christopher Paul "Chris" Colfer (born May 27, 1990) is an American actor, singer, author and producer. He is known for his portrayal of Kurt Hummel on the television series Glee. Colfer's portrayal of Kurt has received critical praise for which he has been the recipient of several awards, including Best Supporting Actor in a Series, Miniseries or Television Film at the 2011 Golden Globe Awards and three consecutive People’s Choice Awards for Favorite Comedic TV Actor in 2013, 2014 and 2015.

people.name: Ksenia Pervak
people.aboutText: Yenew Alamirew Getahun (born May 27, 1990) is an Ethiopian middle and long distance runner.

people.name: Eneli Vals
people.aboutText:
Aymeric Laporte (born 27 May 1994) is a French professional footballer who plays for Spanish club Athletic Bilbao mainly as a central defender.
He is only the second French player – after Bixente Lizarazu – to play for Athletic.

people.name: Aymeric Laporte
people.aboutText:
Eneli Vals (born 27 May 1991) is an Estonian football player, who plays as a midfielder for Naiste Meistriliiga club Tammeka Tartu and the Estonia women's national football team.
^ "Estonia - Eneli Vals - Profile with news, career statistics and history - Soccerway". int.women.soccerway.com.
